thread.title: Elderly hit by energy bill overpayment 'trap'
thread.title_full: Elderly hit by energy bill overpayment 'trap'

author: Dan Hyde
title: Elderly hit by energy bill overpayment 'trap'
text: Energy bills Elderly hit by energy bill overpayment 'trap' Anyone who has switched energy supplier urged check whether they are still paying towards a debt that has been cleared An elderly woman with a pile of bills Photo: Alamy By Dan Hyde , Consumer Affairs Editor 12:01AM GMT 26 Oct 2015
